business.headline: US reciprocal tariffs: Will Dalal Street face more turbulence from April 2?US reciprocal tariffs have put Dalal Street on edge as investors brace for potential market swings. With FPIs cautious and auto stocks under pressure, domestic markets could face more turbulence in the near term.

Trump tariffs could hit these 9 stocks. Should you sell?The IT sector is under pressure due to concerns over Trump's trade policies and potential increases in H-1B visa costs. Indian IT firms earn over 50% of their revenue from the US, making them vulnerable to higher hiring costs and reduced outsourcing contracts.

UK's Primark boss resigns after 'error of judgement' in social settingThe group said on Monday that Paul Marchant had cooperated with an investigation led by external lawyers, acknowledged his "error of judgement" and accepted that his actions fell below the standards expected by AB Foods.

Claiming HRA but not paying TDS? Beware of tax notices and penaltiesThe landlord's PAN must be mentioned in the TDS challan. However, if the PAN is missing or inactive, the TDS is levied at 20% under Section 206AA. On the other hand, for Non-Resident Indian (NRI) landlords, the rate of TDS is 30%.

IPO market off to a slow start in FY26, but these 4 firms to debut soonThe IPO pipeline for FY26 could be worth nearly Rs 2 lakh crore. Some major companies, including Zepto, Reliance Jio, and LG Electronics, are reportedly in the process of finalising their listing plans.

Haldiram's to sell stake to Singapore's Temasek, says PwCThis stake sale is expected to help Haldiram expand both in India and internationally, strengthening its position in the highly competitive snacks and packaged foods market.

ATM withdrawals to cost Rs 23 from May 1 as RBI hikes fee. Check detailsATM cash withdrawal will see an increase from the current charge of Rs 21 per transaction. Despite the fee hike, customers will continue to receive a limited number of free ATM transactions every month.

Is stock market closed today for Eid?The stock market follows a five-day workweek, operating from Monday to Friday. Regular trading hours are from 9:15 am to 3:30 pm. Markets remain closed on weekends and designated public holidays as per the official schedule.

IndiGo gets Rs 944 crore tax penalty, calls it erroneous and frivolousBudget carrier IndiGo's parent company said it had received a Rs 944 crore tax penalty order from the Income Tax Department. The company plans to challenge the order legally and called it "frivolous and erroneous".

Sensex, Nifty closing: Top stocks that gained and lost on BSE, NSEIT and auto sector stocks dragged the market down. The fall in IT and auto stocks is linked to concerns over US reciprocal tariffs, which are set to come into effect on April 2.

Thailand stock exchange halts trading after earthquake hits MyanmarFollowing tremors from the Myanmar earthquake, the Stock Exchange of Thailand suspended all trading for the Friday afternoon session.

DA hiked by 2%: Here's how much central government employees will earn nowWith the 2% hike, DA has now risen from 53% to 55%. Pensioners will also experience a similar increase in their Dearness Relief (DR).

Sensex, Nifty end FY25 on a weak note as Trump tariffs weigh on Dalal StreetThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 191.51 points to close at 77,414.92, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 72.60 points to end at 23,519.35.

How India saw a billionaire boom in just 10 yearsIndia's billionaire club isn't just growing—it's thriving. A decade ago, cracking this list was a rare feat. Now, it's happening faster than ever. Even with market swings and economic headwinds, the country keeps adding new names to its billionaire ranks.

Salary boost for central government employees, DA hiked by 2%With this revision, DA will rise from 53% to 55%, offering a salary boost to employees. The last DA increase took place in July 2024, when it was raised from 50% to 53%.
Missed TDS on rent? Here's what tax department is doingThe law requires tenants to deduct TDS at 2% on rent above Rs 50,000 per month, in case the landlord is a resident Indian.

India offers to lower US farm tariffs, looks to strengthen trade ties: ReportIndia-US trade talk: The government has proposed reducing import duties on several US agricultural products, including almonds, walnuts, cranberries, pistachios, and lentils.

Why is stock market falling today? 3 things investors need to knowThe S&P BSE Sensex was down 339.66 points to 77,266.77 at 1:13 pm and the NSE Nifty50 traded 100.45 points lower to trade at 23,491.50. Here are three important points retail investors need to know.

India's billionaires have wealth bigger than Saudi Arabia's GDP. Check detailsIndia's billionaires now have a combined wealth that exceeds the entire economy of Saudi Arabia. India ranks third globally in the number of billionaires, behind the United States and China.

Health insurance rejected? Here are 5 things you need to knowUnderstanding why health insurance claims are rejected is important as it will help you avoid unnecessary stress or financial burden during medical emergencies.

How this scheme can help you save Rs 20 lakh in 15 years for daughterIf you are planning for your daughter's higher education expenses, the Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana (SSY) can be a great savings option.

Razorpay's Shashank Kumar, Harshil Mathur become India's youngest billionairesHarshil Mathur and Shashank Kumar met at IIT Roorkee, where they shared an interest in technology and problem-solving. Their journey into fintech began in 2014 when they launched Razorpay to simplify digital payments in India.
Sensex, Nifty fall in early trade over Trump tariff threats; Infosys down 2%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 282.59 points to 77,323.84, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 84.70 points to 23,507.25 as of 9:42 am.
Planning a bank transfer on March 31? Here's why it may not workWhile banks will remain open, transactions like fund transfers, cash deposits, and withdrawals may not go through.

Stocks to watch today: Infosys, Tata Motors, BEL, Adani Power, HCLTech and moreMarkets are set for a strong start on March 6 as key stocks like Infosys, Tata Motors, and Adani Power grab attention. Trade talks, global deals, and company moves could shape today's trading session. Here's what investors need to know.

Sensex, Nifty today: Will positive run continue on stock market?Stock market opening today: The Sensex and Nifty gained in the previous session amid reports of positive talks between Indian and US officials about a trade deal. Analysts have noted that the focus during today's trading session will be on upcoming tariff developments and the India-US trade deal outcome.
US suspends WTO financial contributions: ReportThe Trump administration has reportedly suspended financial contributions to The World Trade Organisation amid efforts to cut back government spending.
Wall Street drifts as auto tariffs hurt GM, help Tesla and othersDonald Trump's auto tariffs impacted Wall Street on Thursday morning, with autogiant General Motors falling by 6.8%.

Trump's 25% auto tariff: Which Indian companies will pay the priceUS President Donald Trump's 25% tariff on car imports will affect a few Indian companies, including Tata Motors, Eicher Motors, and Samvardhana Motherson. These firms ship components to the US and Europe's markets.

Sensex, Nifty close higher: Top gainers and losers, tariff impact and key driversStock market today: Some of the top gainers during today's session were Bajaj Finserv, IndusInd Bank, NTPC, L&T, Ultratech Cement, Hero MotoCorp, Adani Enterprises and BPCL. On the other hand, some of the top losers were Tata Motors, Sun Pharma, Eicher Motors, Apollo Hospitals, Bharti Airtel, Kotak Mahindra Bank and HCLTech.

Sensex ends 318 points higher, Nifty just below 23,600; Tata Motors down 5%Stock market closing bell: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 317.93 points higher at 77,606.43, while the NSE Nifty50 rose 105.10 points to settle at 23,591.95.

Noida, Greater Noida flat registration fees may rise 20-30%According to a draft notification, circle rates in Noida could see a 20% hike, while in Greater Noida, the increase may go up to 30%. The move is expected to make property transactions more expensive in the region.

India may receive reprieve from proposed US tariffs: SourcesIndia may escape the proposed US tariffs and avoid being grouped with nations like China, Mexico, and Canada, according to government sources. Trade talks between the two countries are progressing smoothly, with no signs of a deadlock as the April 2 deadline for US reciprocal tariffs approaches.

RBI may double foreign individual investor limit to 10% in listed firms: ReportForeign portfolio investors (FPIs), pressured by poor earnings, high valuations and prospects of U.S. tariffs, have pulled more than $28 billion out of Indian stocks since September's record high in the benchmark NSE Nifty 50.

Elon Musk leads Hurun Global Rich List despite $100 billion drop in net worthElon Musk has reretained his position as the wealthiest person in the world for the fourth time in five years, becoming the first individual to surpass the $400 billion threshold, noted the Hurun Research report.

US tariff reprieve for India, may not be treated like China, Canada, Mexico: SourcesTrade talks between the two nations are progressing smoothly, with no deadlock expected before the April 2 deadline for US reciprocal tariffs.

Infosys terminates more trainees from Mysuru campus, but offers…: ReportInfosys has terminated more trainees from its Myrusu campus. The IT giant had terminated hundreds of trainees from the same campus just two months ago.

Tata Motors shares slump as US slaps 25% duty on car importsTata Motors stock price: Tata Motors shares slumped 6% in early trade and were trading 5.26% lower at Rs 670.70 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) at 9.55 am.

Sensex, Nifty gain after opening lower in volatile trade; Wipro rises nearly 2%Stock market opening: While the Sensex opened 100 points lower, it was trading 64.27 points higher at 77,552.77 at around 9.26 am. The Nifty50 was trading 16.75 points higher at 23,503.60.

Top stocks to watch today: Tata Motors, Wipro, JB Chemicals, Infosys, Vedanta, UPLWhile positive cues are likely to support the two leading indices on Dalal Street, US tariff uncertainty looms large. Here are some of the key stocks that will be in focus today.

entertainment.headline: Prajakta Koli on adapting to social media's challenges: You either swim or surfPrajakta Koli opens up about social media scrutiny, adapting to feedback, and learning from mistakes. She reflects on evolving as a creator while balancing authenticity and audience accountability.

Emotional Kim Soo-hyun says sorry, speaks on Kim Sae-ron death: Took me so longKim Soo-hyun said in a press conference that he feels distressed for the late actor and his ex-girlfriend Kim Sae-ron. He accepted his relationship with Sae-ron, but maintained that she wasn't a minor when they dated each other four years ago.

Where are good stories: Shabana Azmi on decline of Hindi cinema | ExclusiveIn an exclusive chat with India Today, Shabana Azmi critiques Bollywood's weak storytelling, OTT's impact, and the lack of recall value in films. She also praises changing roles for women, saying actresses now have longer careers than before.

Barkha Bisht accuses ex-husband Indraneil of cheating: My belief in humanity brokeActor Barkha Bisht said that her ex-husband, actor Indraneil Sengupta, cheated on her when they were married. Barkha, who was married to Indraneil for 15 years, tried to save the marriage, and even stayed with him for two years after learning about his infidelity.

Helen Mirren on not liking James Bond: It's born out of profound sexismHollywood icon Dame Helen Mirren has criticised the James Bond franchise for its sexist portrayal of women. She advocated for more recognition of real-life female spies.

Actor Sudhanshu Pandey joins Wagle Ki Duniya as a rockstarSudhanshu Pandey joins the cast of Wagle Ki Duniya as a rockstar named Rocky. His arrival brings a mix of excitement, jealousy, and intrigue as the neighborhood buzzes with his rockstar charm.

Two films, two fates: Empuraan writer Murali Gopy's tryst with political dramasIn 2013, writer Murali Gopy's 'Left Right Left' criticised the Left factions. His recent film 'Empuraan' was called out for its 'anti-Hindu' ideology. In this piece, let's take a look at how the two films faced different fates.

Turkish singer Volkan Konak dies after onstage collapse in CyprusRenowned Turkish singer Volkan Konak tragically died after collapsing on stage during a concert in Cyprus. Despite immediate medical attention, he was declared dead at the hospital, leaving fans and the music world in mourning.

Ajith Kumar's son Aadvik's fanboy moment with football legend RonaldinhoAjith Kumar's son, Aadvik, had a fanboy moment when he met football legend Ronaldinho in Chennai. Shalini Ajith Kumar shared a video of the special moment on Instagram.

Kartik Aaryan gets mobbed in Gangtok while shooting for Anurag Basu's film. WatchKartik Aaryan has been shooting for Anurag Basu's romantic drama with Sreeleela in Northeast India. A video has surfaced online in which he is seen being surrounded by a huge crowd.

Richa Chadha slams top filmmakers stereotyping actors: We can learn from SouthRicha Chadha has openly criticised the film industry's tendency to typecast actors, urging a shift towards more inclusive casting. She highlighted the South Indian film industry as a model for diverse role opportunities.

Kapil Sharma's first look from Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon 2 unveiled on EidKapil Sharma's first look from Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon 2 was revealed on Eid. Directed by Anukalp Goswami, the comedy sequel also stars Manjot Singh and is produced by Abbas-Mustan.
Shangri-La Frontier season 3 announced with key visual art. Seen yet?Season 3 of the popular anime Shangri-La Frontier was announced on Sunday, the very day when the second season came to an end.

Kareena honours backstage heroes, recalls pregnancy ramp-walkActor Kareena Kapoor Khan closed the grand finale of the Lakme Fashion Week on Sunday with a heart-warming shout-out to the people working backstage. She also recalled the time when she walked the runway during pregnancy.

Gautami Kapoor claps back at Ekta's indirect dig at husband Ram's weight lossActor and Ram Kapoor's wife Gautami Kapoor mimicked Ekta Kapoor's video amid the ongoing feud between Ekta and Ram. The conflict started over Ram's claims about Bade Achhe Lagte Hain and intensified with social media digs.

Sikandar box office Day 1: Piracy hits Salman Khan's film, opens at Rs 30 croreSikandar box office collection Day 1: Salman Khan's film had a decent opening on Sunday. However, piracy hit the film ahead of its release. Experts have suggested that the film's online leak might cause a 30-40% loss in business.

Empuraan box office Day 4: Mohanlal film earns Rs 60 crore in India amid backlashMohanlal and director Prithviraj Sukumaran's Empuraan courted controversy over the portrayal of riot scenes. Despite the row, the film has earned over Rs 60 crore nett at the domestic box office.

Mohanlal aware of every scene: Prithviraj's mother over Empuraan rowPrithviraj Sukumaran's mother and actor Mallika Sukumaran defended her son in the ongoing Empuraan row. In a long Facebook post, she claimed that Mohanlal was aware of every scene in Empuraan and that her son never deceived anyone.
Screen idol Richard Chamberlain dies at 90American actor Richard Chamberlain, known for his shows such as Shogun and Dr Kildare, has died. He was 90.

general news.headline: PM visited RSS office to 'announce September retirement plan', Sanjay Raut claimsSanjay Raut has claimed that the RSS will decide Prime Minister Narendra Modi's successor, linking the latter's recent Nagpur visit to a leadership transition.

Annamalai softens stance on BJP-AIADMK alliance after top leader met Amit ShahBJP Tamil Nadu chief Annamalai softened his stance on AIADMK after party general secretary Edappadi K Palaniswamy met Amit Shah. While the BJP state chief avoided alliance discussions, he hinted at leadership flexibility.

Bangkok high-rise crumbles in quake, stolen documents and China tie emergeThai authorities are investigating a Chinese-backed firm after a 33-storey high-rise in Bangkok collapsed during Myanmar's 7.7-magnitude earthquake, killing 17.

Devendra Fadnavis's 'Mughal culture' jab at Sanjay Raut over PM succession claimAttacking Sanjay Raut over his 'Mughal' mindset, Fadnavis said, 'In Indian culture, the younger ones do not think this way while elders are present. This is Mughal culture.'

Two films, two fates: Empuraan writer Murali Gopy's tryst with political dramasIn 2013, writer Murali Gopy's 'Left Right Left' criticised the Left factions. His recent film 'Empuraan' was called out for its 'anti-Hindu' ideology. In this piece, let's take a look at how the two films faced different fates.

Twist in Nepal tale: Ex-Maoist guerrilla leads fight for monarchy, Hindu nationNepal is on the boil with pro-monarchy protesters flooding Kathmandu streets. It was a Maoist movement that ended the monarchy in Nepal in 2008. In a twist in the tale, it is a former Maoist guerrilla, Durga Prasai, who is now leading the fight to bring back the king, and make Nepal a Hindu kingdom.

YouTuber owned Lamborghini that hit 2 in Noida, to-be buyer at wheel during crashThe police have summoned YouTuber Mridul Tiwari for questioning as they investigate who authorised the car's use at the time of the incident on Sunday evening.

Director who offered film to Maha Kumbh-viral Monalisa arrested in rape caseThe complainant, a 28-year-old woman, alleged that she met Mishra through social media platforms TikTok and Instagram in 2020 while living in Uttar Pradesh's Jhansi.

Are you regularly experiencing stuffy nose, headache? It could be your ACWhile air conditioners help cool the room, they also remove moisture from the air, which can cause dryness in the nose, throat, and skin. This is where a humidifier can help.

Elon Musk heckled during speech, he fires back: 'Say hi to George Soros for me'When interrupted by a protester during his Town Hall address, Elon Musk said he was not surprised, claiming the disruption was caused by 'operatives' planted by his George Soros.

Don't read history on WhatsApp: Raj Thackeray on row over Aurangzeb's tombSpeaking at his Gudi Padwa rally in Mumbai, Raj Thackeray warned against misleading narratives and WhatsApp forwards, stressing the need for credible historical sources.

Studio Ghibli images made with ChatGPT look cute, behind them lies a terrifying realityIf you have been online in the last few days, you will know about the AI-generated Studio Ghibli images. They are all over social media. They look cute, they seem fun and are spreading cheer. But behind them, lies a terrifying reality that most people are not recognising.

Emotional Kim Soo-hyun says sorry, speaks on Kim Sae-ron death: Took me so longKim Soo-hyun said in a press conference that he feels distressed for the late actor and his ex-girlfriend Kim Sae-ron. He accepted his relationship with Sae-ron, but maintained that she wasn't a minor when they dated each other four years ago.

Where are good stories: Shabana Azmi on decline of Hindi cinema | ExclusiveIn an exclusive chat with India Today, Shabana Azmi critiques Bollywood's weak storytelling, OTT's impact, and the lack of recall value in films. She also praises changing roles for women, saying actresses now have longer careers than before.

Why Nepal wants king back 13 governments, 19 years laterThere were protests in 2006 which forced former Nepal king Gyanendra Shah to give up power and 19 years later, there are protests to bring him back. What changed in two decades?

Woman Naxal with Rs 25 lakh bounty killed in Chhattisgarh encounterA woman leader of a Naxal group, with a bounty of Rs 25 lakh on her head, was killed in an encounter in Chhattisgarh's Dantewada district along with several others.

The hidden dangers of India's obsession with self-medicationSelf-medication can lead to unintended side effects and even serious health risks. Indians obsessing over self-medication comes from various aspects, including financial constraints, cultural beliefs, and a general distrust of the medical system.

Watch: Chahal, Shreyas Iyer, Arshdeep's heartwarming meet up with 'special' fanPunjab Kings cricketers Yuzvendra Chahal, Shreyas Iyer and Arshdeep Singh met with a special fan ahead of their game against Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) on April 1.

Iran readies missiles to retaliate after Trump's threat over nuclear deal: ReportFollowing Donald Trump's threat, Iran has placed its missiles in ready-to-launch mode within underground facilities across the country, designed to withstand airstrikes.

Not able to create Ghibli style images? Here is a prompt that should workA primary reason why some users are unable to generate Ghibli-style images is that they are not using the right prompt. Here is how to quickly create Ghibli style images on ChatGPT or Grok AI.

How pret label 'S&N by Shantnu & Nikhil' is trying to make fashion more sustainableIn an exclusive conversation with India Today,  Shantnu & Nikhil opened up about their pret brand, sustainable fashion, and their latest collection.

Nasa sent mice into space. What happened to their bones is scaryThe study has uncovered how weightlessness in space leads to significant bone loss in mice, providing important insights that could help protect astronauts during long missions.

Hyderabad University tense amid protest over land takeover, 53 students detainedPolice detained several University of Hyderabad students protesting against the alleged auction of 400 acres of land. Students claimed earthmovers were clearing the area, while university authorities denied ownership of the disputed land.

700 worshippers killed when quake hit during Friday prayers: Myanmar Muslim bodyA Myanmar Muslim organisation said that more than 700 worshippers were killed, and some 60 mosques were damaged in Friday's earthquake that shook the country to its core.

sports.headline: Riyan Parag's bold claim: Always felt like I was captaining Rajasthan from Day 1Riyan Parag made the bold claim that he felt like he was captaining Rajasthan Royals from the time he joined the franchise. Riyan joined the franchise during the 2018 auction and has been a regular in the side since then.

Rayudu suggests batting order shift for struggling MI: Send Naman Dhir at no 3Former India cricketer Ambati Rayudu has suggested Mumbai Indians to promote Naman Dhir at number three in the upcoming game against Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) in Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025)

KKR want to forget past results at Wankhede vs MI: Angkrish RaghuvanshiAngkrish Raghuvanshi has said that KKR doesn't want to focus on their past results at the Wankhede stadium when they take on MI on Monday, March 31. KKR doesn't have a great record while playing at the iconic ground.

Watch: Chahal, Shreyas Iyer, Arshdeep's heartwarming meet up with 'special' fanPunjab Kings cricketers Yuzvendra Chahal, Shreyas Iyer and Arshdeep Singh met with a special fan ahead of their game against Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) on April 1.

CSK's mistakes in IPL 2025 have been painful to watch: Rayudu after RR lossAmbati Rayudu launched a scathing attack on Chennai Super Kings' fielding efforts on Sunday, March 30 during their loss against the Rajasthan Royals in Guwahati. CSK were sloppy on the field against RR.

Shardul Thakur asks for fair chance for bowlers amid run fests in IPL 2025Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) all-rounder Shardul Thakur asked for the restoration of balance between bat and ball amid the ongoing run fests in the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

3 pretty good moments: Stephen Fleming reflects on turning points in RR vs CSKStephen Fleming reflected on the main turning points in CSK's loss to RR in Guwahati on Sunday, March 30. CSK lost the match by 6 runs in Guwahati and Fleming pointed out his side's performance in the powerplay, Riyan Parag's catch of Shivam Dube and Wanindu Hasaranga's bowling performance as the main reasons for the defeat.

MI vs KKR, pitch, weather report: High-scoring game on cards in hot MumbaiMumbai Indians will welcome the Kolkata Knight Riders to the Wankhede stadium on Monday, March 31. MI are looking for their first win of the season while KKR will aim to continue their momentum.

IPL 2025 preview MI vs KKR: Battered Mumbai desperate to get campaign going at homeIPL 2025, Mumbai Indians vs Kolkata Knight Riders Match Preview: Mumbai will look for their maiden win of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) as they take on Kolkata in Match 12 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

MI vs KKR predicted XI, fantasy picks: Will Mumbai make big changes at home?Mumbai Indians are set to welcome defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders to the iconic Wankhede stadium for their first home game of the IPL 2025 campaign on Monday, March 31. MI will be looking to make some big changes while KKR are set to welcome back Sunil Narine to the lineup.

Not MS Dhoni, the top order needs to stand up for CSKMS Dhoni was criticised once again after CSK loss against Rajasthan Royals on Sunday. But should the fans really be mad at him? Should they not be more concerned about their non-performing top order that has not turned up in three back to back matches.

IPL 2025: After CSK win, RR captain Riyan Parag fined for code of conduct breachFollowing the win over Chennai Super Kings, Rajasthan Royals' stand-in skipper Riyan Parag was fined Rs. 12 lakhs for maintaining a slow over-rate during the match in Guwahati on Sunday, March 30.

Jofra Archer set up the game perfectly for us in the powerplay: Nitish RanaRajasthan Royals (RR) batter Nitish Rana praised fast bowler Jofra Archer for his match-winning spell against Chennai Super Kings (CSK) in match 11 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025). Archer registered figures of 1/13 in three overs as Rajasthan won by six runs.

IPL 2025: Nitish Rana in awe of Riyan Parag for match-turning moment against CSKNitish Rana praised Rajasthan Royals (RR) stand-in captain Riyan Parag for his match-turning catch of Shivam Dube during Match 18 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

MS Dhoni can't bat 10 overs running full stick: Stephen Fleming on CSK legendCSK coach Stephen Fleming has said that MS Dhoni can't bat for 10 overs during a match and the legendary wicketkeeper decides when he wants to come in after their loss to RR on Sunday, March 30.

Jakub Mensik stuns idol Novak Djokovic to win 1st ATP title at Miami OpenJakub Mensik beat his idol Novak Djokovic to clinch his maiden ATP title at the Miami Open. The 19-year-old beat Djokovic 7-6 (7-4), 7-6 (7-4) and became the ninth youngest to win an ATP title.

MS Dhoni still the same old match-winner? CSK legend's IPL numbers don't agree IPL 2025: MS Dhoni hasn't contributed enough to CSK's wins since the 2023 edition of the tournament. On Sunday, Dhoni's 16-run knock went in vain as the Super Kings lost to Rajasthan Royals by six runs in Guwahati.

Watch: Bumrah starts bowling at NCA, sparks return hopes for Mumbai IndiansIndia and Mumbai Indians fast bowler Jasprit Bumrah has started bowling with full intensity at the Centre of Excellence in Bengaluru. The speedster has been out of action since the fifth Test of the Border Gavaskar Trophy 2024-25.

Gaikwad to open, not Tripathi: Vaughan suggests CSK batting changeMichael Vaughan believes Chennai Super Kings must let Ruturaj Gaikwad open instead of Rahul Tripathi to revive their batting order. Tripathi was underwhelming yet  again in CSK's 6 -run defeat to Rajasthan Royals.

Under Nadal's tutelage, Maaya Rajeshwaran sets sights on ultimate ambitionIn an exclusive interview with India Today Digital, India's 15-year-old tennis sensation Maaya Rajeshwaran talked about her campaign in the Mumbai Open, where she qualified for the semi-finals and opened up on her experience of training under the eyes of Rafael Nadal at the Spanish legend's academy in Mallorca.

Points Table, March 30: MI pushed to bottom by Royals after Chennai heistIPL Points Table Update, March 30: Rajasthan Royals got off from the bottom of the table after beating the Chennai Super Kings by six runs in the second of Sunday's doubleheader at the Barsapara Cricket Stadium in Guwahati.

IPL 2025: MS Dhoni checks on injured RR coach Dravid after Guwahati thrillerDespite Chennai Super Kings' heartbreaking defeat to Rajasthan Royals, MS Dhoni's heartwarming gesture of checking on injured RR coach Rahul Dravid after the match won hearts. CSK suffered a narrow defeat in Guwahati despite Dhoni coming up to bat at number 7.

CSK not pro-active enough? Gaikwad calls for improvement after defeat vs RRIPL 2025, RR vs CSK: Ruturaj Gaikwad said that the Chennai Super Kings were not proactive enough after losing to the Rajasthan Royals on Sunday where they failed to chase down 183 at the Barsapara Stadium in Guwahati.

IPL 2025: MS Dhoni walks in at No.7, but fails to fire for CSK vs RRMS Dhoni's promotion to number 7 wasn't enough as Chennai Super Kings suffered their second consecutive defeat, falling short of the 183-run target against Rajasthan Royals despite a valiant effort from their skipper.

Nitish Rana, Hasaranga stun CSK in Guwahati as RR open account in IPL 2025IPL 2025: Rajasthan Royals clinched their first win of the season by defeating Chennai Super Kings on Sunday, March 30. Chennai failed to chase down a target of over 180 runs once again. Wanindu Hasaranga and Nitish Rana starred for RR after poor starts to their respective seasons.

Riyan Parag, Fraser-McGurk, Vijay Shankar grab sensational catchesIPL 2025: Riyan Parag took a brilliant catch to send Shivam Dube packing in the match between CSK and RR. Earlier in the day, Delhi Capitals' Jake Fraser-McGurk pulled off a stupendous catch as well.

20 games, 0 losses: Barcelona hammer Girona 4-1 to continue dream run in 2025FC Barcelona thrashed Girona 4-1 on Sunday to continue their dream run in 2025. Barcelona have played a total of 20 matches so far in 2025 and have not lost a single one of them.

After 699 days, Jofra Archer ends wait for IPL wicket with fiery overIPL 2025, RR vs CSK: Jofra Archer breathed fire in his first two overs when he also got the wicket of the in-form Rachin Ravindra in Rajasthan's clash against Chennai on Sunday at the Barsapara Stadium in Guwahati.

DC vs SRH: How big brother KL Rahul helped Abhishek Porel forget costly dropIPL 2025, DC vs SRH: Abhishek Porel dropped SunRisers Hyderabad's Aniket Verma on 6 in Vzag on Sunday. The debutant went on to hit 74 off 41 deliveries in their loss to Delhi Capitals.

Watch: R Ashwin and MS Dhoni recreate old magic to outfox rampaging Nitish RanaIPL 2025, RR vs CSK: MS Dhoni and R Ashwin recreated a bit of old magic to stop Nitish Rana's rampage in Guwahati. The Rajasthan Royals star missed a well-deserved hundred after he was out stumped by Dhoni on Sunday, March 30.

KKR coach responds to pitch controversy: We expect some home advantageIPL 2025: Chandrakant Pandit downplayed pitch controversy, asserting KKR's readiness to adapt to any conditions while expecting fair home advantage like other IPL teams. KKR take on Mumbai Indians on March 31, as they look to build some winning momentum.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
